title: Synthesis, anticancer evaluation of novel hybrid pyrazole-based chalcones, molecular docking, DNA fragmentation, and gene expression: in vitro studies
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,21859-21873
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03375B, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Norhan Yasser, Farid M. Sroor, Haidan M. El-Shorbagy, Shaymaa M. Eissa, Hamdi M. Hassaneen, Ismail A. Abdelhamid
A new series of pyrazole-based chalcones were synthesized and tested against MCF7, PC3, PACA2 and BJ1 as in vitro study. Gene expression, DNA damage, DNA fragmentation and molecular docking for were discussed.
